mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM daero.users

SELECT * FROM (SELECT row_number() over (ORDER BY u.users_seq ASC) AS row, profile_image_link, nickname, users_seq, created_at, suspended_yn, (select COUNT(*) FROM reports r WHERE r.reported_users_seq=u.users_seq) AS report_count FROM daero.users u) AS user WHERE (#{page} -1)*10 < user.row AND user.row < 1+(#{page}*10)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM daero.reports

SELECT * FROM (SELECT row_number() over (ORDER BY r.reports_seq ASC) AS row, reports_seq, reporter_users_seq, reported_users_seq, reported_at, report_url, report_categories_seq, handled_yn, article_type FROM daero.reports r) AS report WHERE (#{page} -1)*10 < report.row AND report.row < 1+(#{page}*10)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM daero.replies WHERE `articles_seq`=#{articleSeq} AND `rereply_parent` IS NULL

SELECT * FROM (SELECT row_number() over (ORDER BY r.replies_seq ASC) AS row, replies_seq, users_seq, content, created_at, (SELECT nickname FROM daero.users u WHERE u.users_seq=r.users_seq) AS nickname FROM daero.replies r WHERE r.articles_seq=#{articleSeq} AND r.rereply_parent IS NULL) AS reply WHERE (#{page} -1)*10 < reply.row AND reply.row < 1+(#{page}*10)
SELECT replies_seq, users_seq, content, created_at, (SELECT nickname FROM daero.users u WHERE u.users_seq=r.users_seq) AS nickname FROM daero.replies r WHERE r.rereply_parent=#{replySeq}
SELECT `replies_seq`, `users_seq`, `content`, `created_at`, (SELECT nickname FROM daero.users u WHERE u.users_seq=r.users_seq) AS nickname FROM daero.replies r WHERE `replies_seq`=#{replySeq}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM daero.articles

SELECT * FROM (SELECT row_number() over (ORDER BY a.articles_seq ASC) AS row, a.articles_seq, a.title, a.created_at, a.open_yn, (SELECT t.users_seq FROM trips t WHERE t.trips_seq=a.trips_seq) AS users_seq FROM daero.articles a) AS article WHERE (#{page} -1)*10 < article.row AND article.row < 1+(#{page}*10)

SELECT * FROM (SELECT row_number() over (ORDER BY u.users_seq ASC) AS row, profile_image_link, nickname, users_seq, created_at, suspended_yn, (select COUNT(*) FROM reports r WHERE r.reported_users_seq=u.users_seq) AS report_count FROM daero.users u WHERE u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')) AS user WHERE (#{page} -1)*10 < user.row AND user.row < 1+(#{page}*10)

SELECT * FROM (SELECT row_number() over (ORDER BY tp.trip_places_seq ASC) AS row, trip_places_seq, place_name, address FROM daero.trip_places tp) AS place WHERE (#{page} -1)*10 < place.row AND place.row < 1+(#{page}*10)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM daero.trip_places
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM daero.inquires

SELECT inquiry.inquires_seq AS inquiry_seq, inquiry.user_name, inquiry.title, inquiry.created_at, inquiry.answer_at, inquiry.answer_yn, inquiry.author FROM (SELECT row_number() over (ORDER BY i.inquires_seq ASC) AS row, `inquires_seq`, `title`, `created_at`, `answer_yn`, `answer_at`, (SELECT u.nickname FROM daero.users u WHERE u.users_seq = i.users_seq) AS user_name, (SELECT admin_name FROM daero.admin a WHERE a.admin_seq = i.admin_seq) AS author
FROM daero.inquires i) AS inquiry WHERE (#{page}-1)*10 < inquiry.row AND inquiry.row < 1+(#{page}*10)

SELECT `title`, `created_at`, `answer_yn`, `content`, `answer`, `answer_at`, (SELECT u.nickname FROM daero.users u WHERE u.users_seq = i.users_seq) AS user_name, (SELECT admin_name FROM daero.admin a WHERE a.admin_seq = i.admin_seq) AS author FROM daero.inquires i;
mapper.update: UPDATE daero.inquires i SET answer=#{content}, answer_yn='y', answer_at=DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %T'), admin_seq= (SELECT admin_seq FROM daero.admin a WHERE a.admin_name = #{author}) WHERE i.inquires_seq = #{inquirySeq};
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM faq

SELECT faqs.`faq_seq`, faqs.`title`, faqs.`content`, faqs.`created_at`, faqs.`admin_name` FROM (SELECT row_number() over (ORDER BY f.faq_seq ASC) AS row, `faq_seq`, `title`, `content`, `created_at`, (SELECT admin_name FROM daero.admin a WHERE a.admin_seq = f.admin_seq) AS admin_name FROM daero.faq f) AS faqs WHERE (#{page}-1)*10 < faqs.row AND faqs.row < 1+(#{page}*10)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO daero.faq (`title`, `content`, `created_at`, `updated_at`, `admin_seq`) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %T'), DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %T'), (SELECT admin_seq FROM daero.admin a WHERE a.admin_name = #{author}))
mapper.update: UPDATE daero.faq SET `title`=#{title}, `content`=#{content}, `updated_at`=DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %T'), `admin_seq`=(SELECT admin_seq FROM daero.admin a WHERE a.admin_name = #{author}) WHERE faq_seq = #{faqSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM daero.notice

SELECT noti.`notice_seq`, noti.`title`, noti.`content`, noti.`created_at`, noti.`admin_seq` FROM (SELECT row_number() over (ORDER BY n.notice_seq ASC) AS row, n.`notice_seq`, n.`title`, n.`content`, n.`created_at`, n.`admin_seq`
FROM daero.notice n) AS noti WHERE (#{page}-1)*10 < noti.row AND noti.row < 1+(#{page}*10)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO daero.notice (`title`, `content`, `created_at`, `updated_at`, `admin_seq`) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %T'), DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %T'), #{adminSeq})
